pullrequest.title: Building editor: Import background image and improve add/delete levels

content.raw:
Current defaults:

### Wall ###
**Thickness**: 0.2 m ~ 7.9 in

**Height**: 2.5 m ~ 98.4 in

*(Windows and doors are only holes on the wall, so they don't have thickness)*
### Window ###
**Width**: 0.8 m ~ 31.5 in

**Height**: 0.8 m ~ 31.5 in

**Elevation**: 0.5 m ~ 19.7 in (distance from base of window to floor, I think it looks very low right now)

### Door ###
**Width**: 1.0 m ~ 39.4 in

**Height**: 2.0 m ~ 78.7 in

**Elevation**: 0.0 m ~ 0.0 in

### Stairs ###
**Width**: 1.0 m ~ 39.4 in

**Depth**: 3.5 m ~ 137.8 in

**Height**: wall height

**Steps**: 15 (step height: 0.17 m ~ 6.6 in)

Current defaults:

Wall

Thickness: 0.2 m ~ 7.9 in

Height: 2.5 m ~ 98.4 in

(Windows and doors are only holes on the wall, so they don't have thickness)

Window

Width: 0.8 m ~ 31.5 in

Height: 0.8 m ~ 31.5 in

Elevation: 0.5 m ~ 19.7 in (distance from base of window to floor, I think it looks very low right now)

Door

Width: 1.0 m ~ 39.4 in

Height: 2.0 m ~ 78.7 in

Elevation: 0.0 m ~ 0.0 in

Stairs

Width: 1.0 m ~ 39.4 in

Depth: 3.5 m ~ 137.8 in

Height: wall height

Steps: 15 (step height: 0.17 m ~ 6.6 in)
